FuncDef: This command configures an entry for a specific GTP message type value.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the index into the GTP message value list that defines a custom message-type action. Values-1 to 255.

Specifies the GTP-u message type, either as a numeric value or as a string. Values-1 to 255 or 256 characters {echo-request, echo-response, error-indication, g-pdu, supported-extension-headers-notification}.
Specifies the action to take for packets that match this GTP filter message entry.
